name: Staff of Slumber
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Magic Items/Staves/Staff of Slumber

Construction.Requirements: Craft Staff, deep slumber, dream, nightmare, symbol of sleep, ray of exhaustion, waves of fatigue

sections.body:
Smoky spirals adorn the length of this staff, having an almost hypnotic effect. The staff allows use of the following spells:

  • deep slumber (1 charge)
  • ray of exhaustion (1 charge)
  • dream (2 charges)
  • nightmare (2 charges)
  • waves of fatigue (2 charges)
  • symbol of sleep (3 charges)
